name: @itk-wasm/htj2k-build
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:wasi
scripts.bindgen:typescript: /home/matt/src/itk-wasm/src/itk-wasm-cli.js -b emscripten-build bindgen --package-version 1.1.2 --package-name @itk-wasm/htj2k --package-description "Wasm-SIMD accelerated decoding and encoding of High-throughput JPEG2000 (HTJ2K) images." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKIOOpenJPH'
scripts.bindgen:python: itk-wasm -b wasi-build bindgen --package-version 1.1.2 --interface python --package-name itkwasm-htj2k --package-description "Wasm-SIMD accelerated decoding and encoding High-throughput JPEG2000 (HTJ2K) images." --repository "https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKIOOpenJPH"
